title: Merch store mishap - Are Riot obligated to fulfil this order?

embed.description: This album is really big! It's going to take us a bit to get your download ready for you. Enter your email and we will notify you when it's ready. Once ready, it will be available for up to 24 hours.

body:
Ordered 'Urf and Random Figure' from the store. 
When package arrives no random figure included. 
Riot said it was a glitch in the system - an incorrect label on a product. I said, I bought item, under the impression a random figure was included because that's what it said on my order. I want my random figure. 
Riot said too bad, no random figure for you.

Are Riot obligated to fulfil this order or not? 
I don't know how business, products, labelling and consumer rights work.

replies.body:
If they don't fulfil it then you have legal grounds for a 'False Advertising' suit, which is taken very seriously. People have sued coke for giving false information about how much sugar is in drinks etc. and won the suit receiving millions of dollars.
(and winning legal action against a major corporation is not easy in the slightest, so they do take it seriously)

(im not saying that you should sue them or anything but you ARE legally in the right on this)

either way RIOT is acting very badly about this.
Sad that they'd be criminal scum to customers. Fulfill the order you stingy f*s

Erm,yes they are if it states you got it on the receipt yes they need to fill the order regardless.....
Does it state it on the receipt?
Is that from the store also?
If it is print screen it as well as the receipt...
Have they responded to your request in any shape or form?

Yes it stated 'Ufr and Random Figure' on the invoice that came with the package: see link

http://imgur.com/4BNu0g4

I opened a ticket. 
Sent through all my screens of receipts and invoices. 
I was told, that it was an incorrect label due to a glitch in the system. 
Got apologised too and that no random figure is going to be sent through. 
My problem, but definitely not my fault.

They SHOULD follow through on it, though it doesn't mean they will, realistically you could press legal action, but it's a bit over the top for this error.

Kinda dissappointed to see they didn't just follow through on the stuff up instead of just saying you won't get the extra figurine.

UPDATE:
Riot got in contact with me and refunded the purchase price on my Urf figure. 
Situation resolved
They should apologize, refund the purchase cost and tell you to have a happy holiday ^.^
You could do a chargeback, depending on how you paid of course
Legal action over this would be silly.
